underlying_goal: Plan and create YouTube video series scripts demonstrating Vault Intelligence + Claude Code, using agent teams for parallel script writing
friction_detail: Claude attempted a full reindex after a document edit when incremental indexing was automatic, and asked unnecessary clarifying questions before the user interrupted.
brief_summary: User wanted to plan and produce a 4-episode YouTube series script about Vault Intelligence, using Claude Code agent teams for parallel writing; all 4 episode scripts and a review were completed successfully.
